Row.Text: Allows you to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Galleass[ENDCOLOR], the first ranged naval unit. Also allows you to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Harbor[ENDCOLOR], which creates city connections from cities to the capital over the water, producing [ICON_GOLD] Gold. Additionally, the [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production yield from Fishing Boats is increased.
